grid.expression: SELECT FLUX.NUNOTA, PAR.NOMEPARC, PAR.TELEFONE, PAR.FAX, CID.NOMECID, MOV.UNIDADE, MOV.MENSAGEM FROM sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCMOVIMENTACAO AS MOV WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCFLUXO AS FLUX WITH (NOLOCK) ON MOV.PEDORIGINAL = FLUX.PEDORIGINAL JOIN sankhya.TGFCAB AS CAB WITH (NOLOCK) ON CAB.NUNOTA = FLUX.NUNOTA JOIN sankhya.TGFPAR as PAR WITH (NOLOCK) ON PAR.CODPARC = CAB.CODPARC JOIN sankhya.TSICID AS CID WITH (NOLOCK) ON CID.CODCID = MOV.CODCID WHERE MOV.STATUS IN ('G', 'D', 'W') AND FLUX.DATA >= :DT1 AND FLUX.DATA < DATEADD (DAY, 1,:DT2)
